title: The Dead Held Hands
description: In the ruins of a distant castle, a light comes on signaling the end of everything...Kabyl, son of the famed Captain Davage, discovers the world around him is not as it seems. His beloved is a haunted woman full of secrets. She looks over shoulder at things that are not there and dread's the dark. What is she so afraid of? The Dead hold hands, they say, and lend the living their power. Will they hold hands for Lord Kabyl as he ventures into the unknown?Temple of the Exploding Head, a League of Elder series.
author: Ren Garcia
